# STT integration test fixtures

WAV files: 16 kHz, mono, int16.

- **silence_5s.wav**, **clean_5s.wav**, **clean_30s.wav** â€” generated by `scripts/gen_stt_fixtures.py` (silence). For WER tests on real speech, replace `clean_5s.wav` / `clean_30s.wav` with samples from e.g. LibriSpeech test-clean.
